overview: Title: Acoustic Waltz(Complete Version),  Dates: 16 Jan, 1992,  Venue: Bray Studios, Windsor, Berkshire England  Lineup:  Eric Clapton: Guitar, Vocals Andy Fairweather Low: Guitar  Chuck Leavell: Keyboards  Nathan East: Bass  Steve Ferrone: Drums  Ray Cooper: Percussion  Katie Kissoon: Backing Vocals  Tessa Niles: Backing Vocals
title: Eric Clapton: Acoustic Waltz
